original: Ekman, Åke Torsten, tandläkare, Halmstad, f. 30/3/91 i Halmstad av Hjalmar E. o. Charlotte Wulff. G. 22 m. Anna Vera Vickström. Barn: Hjalmar f. 24, Ernst-Åke 27. — Stud:-ex. i Elaimstad 11, tandl :kand. 12, tandl. 14. Prakt, i Halmstad sed. 14, skoltandil. där samt tandl. v. HalH. reg. 14-27. Hobby: antikviteter.
translated: Ekman, Åke Torsten, dentist, Halmstad, born 30/3/91 in Halmstad to Hjalmar E. and Charlotte Wulff. Married on 22nd month with Anna Vera Vickström. Children: Hjalmar born in 1924, Ernst-Åke born in 1927. Studied for his exams in Elaimstad in 1911, qualified as a dentist in 1912, and graduated in 1914. Started working in Halmstad in 1914 and later became a school dentist there. Also worked as a military dentist for HalH. reg. from 1914 to 1927. His hobby was antiques.
